response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. The value this product offers to you is estimated at $1,000,000. Considering its unique features and the impact it could have on your operations, I am proposing to sell it to you for $950,000. This price not only represents a significant saving for you but also secures a long-term partnership with our esteemed company. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can further customize this solution to meet your specific needs.", "product_price": 950000}
